Package com.payd.shooti.ui

Class UIAnim

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.ui.UIAnim
public class UIAnim extends Object
An internal UIAnim object with an Actor parent can be used to animate the actor with predefined animation configurations.
See Also:
  • UIActor
  • UIGroup
